workout_groups.name: Balance and Stability Drills
workout_groups.description: Exercises to improve balance and stability.

workouts.name: Basic Balance Drills
workouts.description: Perform basic balance drills for 5 minutes.

workouts.name: Intermediate Balance Drills
workouts.description: Perform intermediate balance drills for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Advanced Balance Drills
workouts.description: Perform advanced balance drills for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Balance Drills with Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Perform balance drills with resistance bands for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Balance Drills with Resistance Bands and Sparring
workouts.description: Perform balance drills with resistance bands and sparring for 15 minutes.
